deploy.startCommand: python3 manage.py makemigrations && python3 manage.py migrate && python3 manage.py create_superuser && python3 manage.py collectstatic --noinput && gunicorn saas_staterKit.wsgi && celery -A saas_staterKit worker -E -I info && celery -A saas_staterKit beat -I info --scheduler django_celery_beat.schedulers:DatabaseScheduler
